description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Miner of Duty is a block-building FPS.  The game includes 5 multiplayer game modes: Team Deathmatch, FFA, Fort Wars, Search & Mine, and Custom Maps. Also, Swarm Mode, a zombie-survival game mode, is playable as an offline game mode. Custom Map mode allows you to design a map and play it with others. You are able to customize your character's looks and your weapon classes with an array of weapons.
description.short: Miner of Duty is a block-building FPS.  The game includes 5 multiplayer game modes: Team Deathmatch, FFA, Fort Wars, Search & Mine, and Custom Maps. Also, Swarm Mode, a zombie-survival game mode, is playable as an offline game mode. Custom Map mode allows you to design a map and play it with others. You are able to customize your character's looks and your weapon classes with an array of weapons.
